hooks.command: echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] PostToolUse Hook Triggered - Tool: $TOOL_NAME, File: $TOOL_FILE_PATH" >> "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR"/hook_log.txt; if [[ "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *"ir.json" ]]; then echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] Running IRProcessor on ir.json" >> "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR"/hook_log.txt; python3 "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR"/IRProcessor.py "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR"/ir.json division >> "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR"/hook_log.txt 2>&1; fi
